title: Skardon (mountain)
description: Skardon M., the Šar Mountains, is a mountain range in the Balkans that extends from Kosovo to northeastern Albania.

properties.description: Titov Vrv (Титов врв) is the highest peak of the Šar Mountains, rising to 2,748 m (9,016 ft) above sea level. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Titov Vrv
